price: Na Manabii wangapi tuliwatuma kwa watu wa zamani!
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: Nasi tuliwatuma Manabii wengi kuyaendea mataifa yaliyo tangulia, basi hapana ajabu kitu kumtuma Mtume kwenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
